<!-- test cases from remark-plugin-github -->

An empty link: this and that.

A link to Non GH: <https://feedly.com/i/my>

A link to GH: [github.com](https://github.com)

A link to a user: [@foo](https://github.com/foo)

A link to a project: [foo/bar](https://github.com/foo/bar)

A link to a project branch: [JiangWeixian/flash-point@`part2`](https://github.com/JiangWeixian/flash-point/tree/part2)

A link to a graphs: [foo/bar/graphs](https://github.com/foo/bar/graphs)

A link to a traffic: [foo/bar/graphs/traffic](https://github.com/foo/bar/graphs/traffic)
